description:
"What are you good at sexually?" our interviewer asked Troy.
"I'm pretty good at everything," he replied shortly.
"What's your favorite thing to do to a girl?" our interviewer tried again.
"Ummm, hmmm, I like to, ummm, hold hands, you know," he replied. Then he broke a smile (finally), laughed, and said: "And then fuck her."
Troy definitely needs to loosen up a little. I mean when you have a cute face and smokin', lean, ripped body like he does you should be all about having fun and enjoying the shit out of what nature gave you.
Maybe it was just because there weren't any chicks in the room!
title: Troy
